definitions.definition: A percussive keyboard musical instrument , usually ranging over seven octaves , with white and black colored keys, played by pressing these keys, causing hammers to strike strings .
examples: The piano in his house takes up a lot of space.
She has been taking lessons for many years and now plays piano very well.

main_definition: ( music ) A percussive keyboard musical instrument , usually ranging over seven octaves , with white and black colored keys, played by pressing these keys, causing hammers to strike strings . [from  1803]
